# errorCorrectionLevel

**Instance Property**

The error correction level of the QR code symbol.

## Declaration

```swift
var errorCorrectionLevel: CIQRCodeDescriptor.ErrorCorrectionLevel { get }
```

## Discussion

QR Codes support four levels of Reed-Solomon error correction.

The possible error correction levels are enumerated in [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIDataMatrixCodeDescriptor/ECCVersion-swift.enum].

## Examining a Descriptor

- **errorCorrectedPayload**: The error-corrected codeword payload that comprises the QR code symbol.
- **symbolVersion**: The version of the QR code which corresponds to the size of the QR code symbol.
- **maskPattern**: The data mask pattern for the QR code symbol.
